# armap

This package has map data for Turkey as `SpatialPolygonsDataFrame`. It also 
has some utility functions to merge polygons together. These functions are used
to show clusters of cities as regions for reporting. 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("AudioElektronik/armap")
````
